page.title: 04HOUSING..SLUM CLEARANCE
page.content: Many of the miner's houses have disappeared and been replaced elsewhere in the village. Some of this type of housing still remains and has been purchased from the N.C.B. These have been renovated and converted to the owner's needs. The houses to replace the miner's houses are built to the West of the village. The original miner's houes were built to the East of the village near to where the collieries were. Coucil house building is now at a stand still. However, private house building is taking place, again mainly to the West of the town.
